450+ hours in for a long-time player! CSGO's a tight, objectively consistent shooter; my favourite parts of the game are the deliberate gun play and excellent target fidelity, for which the CS series is well-known. It requires real conscious training and effort to get better at CSGO; you'll learn the game but also about yourself, your impulses and your bad habits. Do yourself a favour, buy the paid version to avoid huge numbers of hackers and casuals

Game crawling with cheaters on every match

Valve's best course of action: "Dear cheaters, please stop"
